Event.Title: Powtech 2013
Event.Desc: Powtech is the world's undisputed number one for powder, granule and bulk solids technologies. It reflects the current state of the art in mechanical processing technologies and instrumentation - and so provides a unique overview for a variety of industries from glass, building materials and paper to pharmaceuticals, chemicals and food.
